title.rendered: 200 Hour Yoga Teacher Training in Chelsea NYC | Yogamaya

content.rendered:
200 Hour Training

All of our trainings now are In Person. This is where it all begins. Rich in both ancient tradition, modern perspectives & the important conversations in today’s yoga community, our 200 Hour Teacher Training is a full spectrum program for those ready to take the leap. Whether you aspire to teach or truly deepen your practice, you’ll study in an interactive environment that encourages self-expression and discovery with a crucial link to the ancient teachings. FAQS >
